column6: Now That I've Found You - A Collection

column1: It's amazing how you can speak right to my heart
column2: 最神奇的事莫过于我们总是心有灵犀
column3: Without saying a word you can light up the dark
column4: 即使不言不语 你也能打破死寂
column5: Try as I may I could never explain
column7: What I hear when you don't say a thing
column8: 为什么你不用开口我也能心领神会
column10: The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
column11: 你的笑容告诉我 你需要我
column12: There's a truth in your eyes sayin' you'll never leave me
column13: 你的眼神向我承诺 你永远陪着我
column14: The touch of your hand says you'll catch me wherever i fall
column15: 你紧握我的温热的手告诉我 无论发生什么你都不会放手
column16: You say it best when you say nothing at all
column19: All day long I can hear people talking out loud
column20: 一整天我都被别人的嘈杂淹没
column21: But when you hold me near
column23: 直到你牵住我的手 世界突然变得宁静平和
column24: Old Mr. Webster could never define
column25: 即便是韦氏词典也无法定义
column26: What's being said between your heart and mine
column28: The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
column29: 你脸上温暖的笑容让我明白你需要我
column30: There's a truth in your eyes sayin' you'll never leave me
column31: 你真挚的眼神向我承诺 你会永远和我在一起
column32: The touch of your hand says you'll catch me if ever I fall
column33: 你紧握我的温热踏实的手掌告诉我 无论发生什么你都不会放手
column34: You say it best when you say nothing at all
column37: The smile on your face lets me know that you need me
column38: 你脸上温暖的笑容告诉我 你需要我
column39: There's a truth in your eyes sayin' you'll never leave me
column40: 你坚定的眼神告诉我  你会永远在我身边
column41: The touch of your hand says you'll catch me if ever I fall
column42: 你紧握我的温热踏实的手掌告诉我 无论发生什么你都不会放手
column43: You say it best when you say nothing at all
